listitem.para: Emulate a busy system and take counter measures. The value can be no (the default) or yes. If enabled, pluto will be forced to be "busy". In this state, which happens when there is a Denial of Service attack, pluto will use cookies before accepting new incoming IKE packets. Cookies are send and required for IKEv1 Aggressive Mode and in IKEv2. This option is mostly used for testing purposes, but can be selected by paranoid administrators as well.
